items.text: that's almost like catching practice and Neesham takes a good one at point. Soft dismissal there for the short of length ball outside off that was much slower - Sabbir merely stuck his bat out with no follow through or power, and the ball ballooned away to point where Neesham dived to his left to just get his fingers under the ball
items.shortText: Ferguson to Sabbir Rahman, OUT

dismissal.text: Sabbir Rahman c Neesham b Ferguson 43 (101m 65b 7x4 0x6) SR: 66.15

items.preText: Mashrafe at No. 10, takes a bit of time to collect his helmet and walk out
items.text: right on the stumps and Mashrafe blocks it back
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.preText: Boult is back, two left for him
items.text: just outside off and pushed back, Boult reacts quickly in his follow through to collect with his right hand
items.shortText: Boult to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: short ball and pulled behind square for one
items.shortText: Boult to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.text: quick and angling across outside off, Mashrafe sticks his bat out and misses
items.shortText: Boult to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: makes a lot of room this time an Boult continues to pitch it well outside off, he swings and misses
items.shortText: Boult to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: gets off the mark this time by driving the fullish ball hard to wide mid-off after making room again
items.shortText: Boult to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.text: really low full inswinging toss, almost a yorker, and it's flicked to leg
items.shortText: Boult to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.preText: Thirty balls to go, wonder if Bangladesh will bat to the last over today like in the first ODI. No Mithun today though
items.text: just a bit of room outside off, enough to tap it down to third man
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.text: another attempted yorker is a low full toss on the shoes, tickled to fine leg
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.text: 147.4kmh, angling in sharply from wide of the crease, he defends it back
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: reaches third man after a bounce as Mashrafe makes a lot of room for the short ball and pulls, only to get a top-edge fine on the off side
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.text: oh he's flicked the ball onto his back leg and it has deflected onto the stumps. Ferguson pitched it up on the stumps, trying the yorker again, and Saifuddin flicked the ball to leg while falling over a bit but only edged the ball onto his back foot and the ball then rolled on to hit the stumps. Another soft dismissal
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Saifuddin, OUT

items.preText: Mustafizur the last man, a slip in place for him
items.text: attempted yorker is a knee-high full toss on off, he defends it on off to keep the strike with Mashrafe
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: short ball, pulled just wide of midwicket and Mashrafe doesn't want the single
items.shortText: Boult to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: a full toss on off, taps it straight to point
items.shortText: Boult to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: drives the length ball away from his body without footwork, thick edge towards third man and they decide for the single this time
items.shortText: Boult to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.text: shortish and well outside off at 140kmh, swing and a miss!
items.shortText: Boult to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: 139kmh, closer to off now, hardly any room and Mustafizur pokes and misses
items.shortText: Boult to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: straight down the ground and that lands just inside the boundary rope! Pitched up from Boult and Mustafizur went for the swing again, connecting well this time and dispatching it straight down the ground over the bowler's head
items.shortText: Boult to Mustafizur Rahman, FOUR runs

items.text: short ball outside off, holds his bat high to connect and gets a single to third man. Single taken off the first ball this time
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.text: short ball angling in, he makes room to swing and misses
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: 142.7kmh, short again, angling in further towards leg to not offer any room and he goes for the upper cut but misses
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: another attempt to ramp the short ball but he misses again
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: 143.1kmh, goes for the yorker this time, Mustafizur backs away and drives with hard hands and just manages an inside edge onto his boot
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mustafizur Rahman, no run
